channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Central South University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Confusion-Resistant Federated Learning via Diffusion-Based Data Harmonization on Non-IID Data
item.description: CRFed, a novel federated learning framework, uses diffusion-based data harmonization and confusion-resistant strategies to significantly boost accuracy and robustness in non-IID data scenarios.

item.title: Fine Tuning Out-of-Vocabulary Item Recommendation with User Sequence Imagination
item.description: User Sequence Imagination (USIM) revolutionizes out-of-vocabulary item recommendation by leveraging user sequence imagination and RL fine-tuning, achieving superior performance in real-world e-commerc…

item.title: Frequency Adaptive Normalization For Non-stationary Time Series Forecasting
item.description: Frequency Adaptive Normalization (FAN) significantly boosts non-stationary time series forecasting accuracy by using Fourier transforms to identify and model dynamic trends and seasonal patterns, achi…

item.title: Ordering-Based Causal Discovery for Linear and Nonlinear Relations
item.description: Causal discovery algorithm CaPS efficiently handles mixed linear and nonlinear relationships in observational data, outperforming existing methods on synthetic and real-world datasets.

item.title: What Factors Affect Multi-Modal In-Context Learning? An In-Depth Exploration
item.description: Unlocking the full potential of multi-modal in-context learning requires understanding its core factors. This research systematically explores these factors, highlighting the importance of a multi-mod…
